title: Psg , Luis Enrique  Donnarumma ? I hope he finds a solution
body_text:
PARIS (FRANCE) (ITALPRESS) – “Can Donnarumma stay? I don’t know. It depends on the transfer market, the player, the other clubs, the agents. We’ll continue as usual. I hope he finds a solution because it would be the best thing for him.” This was stated by PSG coach Luis Enrique regarding the future of the Italian goalkeeper Gigio Donnarumma, who was left out of the squad for recent matches.
About the Champions League draw, which has given the Parisians a match against Barcelona: “It’s a positive and negative feeling. It’s great to play there, it’s my home. They play fantastic, attacking football. But at the same time, it will be difficult for us.”
– photo IPA Agency –
(ITALPRESS).
